name: PROTO ANIMA
description:
PROTO ANIMA was made over a period of a couple months on and off as a side project. It is inspired by projects like the wonderful Experiment 12, started by Terry Cavanagh, as well as my own struggles with identity.

TROUBLESHOOTING/BUG REPORTING/MORE INFO:

Contact me on twitter @goblin_dev_ to tell me what you thought, point out any issues/bugs I may have missed, or just to chat. I'm nice!
